metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18444 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: makeMultiView.cpp in exrmultiview in OpenEXR 2.3.0 has an out-of-bounds write, leading to an assertion failure or possibly unspecified other impact.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> proposed patch in bug  The patch for this issue was dropped during the focal development cycle by mistake.

criterions.comment: openexr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
